title: adepti
author: adepti
content: Looking to buy graded Casascius 1 BTC denomination coins. Prefer graded. Ideally silvers or GILT. DM me with what you haveUSA buyerPrefer meet in person, or escrow if needed.

comments.author: adepti
comments.body: Thank you,I will also consider ungraded 1 BTC denominations as well, but they must be in good condition and pass authenticity checks

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Since you are new to this forum.....please read this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0 Also highly recommend an escrow service like MinerJones!  Goodluck!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: adepti on August 31, 2023, 04:15:08 AMLooking to buy graded Casascius 1 BTC denomination coins. Prefer graded. Ideally silvers or GILT. DM me with what you haveUSA buyerPrefer meet in person, or escrow if needed. I’ve got one in excellent condition. The question is always how much are you willing to pay. At least a ballpark figure might be helpful for others who own one of these. I’m sure everyone would like to buy or sell at some price, so having an idea of what yours is will certainly assist in making a deal come to fruition.

comments.author: adepti
comments.body: Still looking for 1 BTC Casascius coins. The price I'm willing to pay will depend on the coin's grade & condition among other factors.DM me what you have. Thank you for all the generous tips on escrow with minerjones. I'm well aware of the process. I am NOT a newbie to physical CAS coins as I am an avid collector of these.
